mapper.select: SELECT h.*,b.build_number as `buildInfo.buildNumber`,o.owner_name as `houseOwner.ownerName`, t.house_type_name as `houseType.houseTypeName` FROM house_info h LEFT JOIN building_info b on h.build_id=b.build_id LEFT JOIN house_owner o on h.owner_id=o.owner_id LEFT JOIN house_type t on h.house_type_id=t.house_type_id ORDER BY build_id,house_unit,house_number
SELECT house_info.* FROM house_info LEFT JOIN building_info on house_info.build_id=building_info.build_id where building_info.build_number=#{buildNumber} and house_state=0

SELECT h.*,b.build_number as `buildInfo.buildNumber`,o.owner_name as `houseOwner.ownerName`, t.house_type_name as `houseType.houseTypeName` FROM house_info h LEFT JOIN building_info b on h.build_id=b.build_id LEFT JOIN house_owner o on h.owner_id=o.owner_id LEFT JOIN house_type t on h.house_type_id=t.house_type_id WHERE b.build_number LIKE #{buildNumber} AND h.house_unit LIKE #{houseUnit} AND h.house_number LIKE #{houseNumber} AND IFNULL(o.owner_name,'') LIKE #{ownerName} ORDER BY build_id,house_unit,house_number
